name: Angel and Devil on your shoulder
name_original: Angel and Devil on your shoulder
description:
For the theme of "Reset", "2 views" and "Minimal Interaction"

The other lesser known definition of Reset. 

Wear magic glasses to see the 2 views of angel and devil on the customer's shoulder.

Just say Yes or No, and try to earn the most money and reputation for your illicit business, but try not to get caught.

*Very basic POC, not even a full game. May have lots of bugs*
